Example calculation of Kcalc for Mg in M82Si04
And comparison Via Kmeas / Kcalc

- Primary standard is MgO
  Secondary standard is Mg2SiO4

- Measured: Mg Ka in Mg2SiO4
  At 15 kV, Kmeas = 0.5470 (this is Kraw)

- Calculated using CalcZAF:
  Calc. Kraw = K Mg2SiO4 / K MgO
  Kpurei, Sec Std / KpureI, Pri Std
  = 0.25967/0.47401 = 0.54782

- Kmeas / Kca|c = 0.5470 / 0.54782 = 0.9985
